countryComponents

Class Sector

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Arc2D
        • java.awt.geom.Arc2D.Double
          • countryComponents.Sector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Sector
extends java.awt.geom.Arc2D.Double
    An Arc2D object that will be a part of a Pie object. It has a weight (how large it should be on the pie) and a name.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
